entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindor students are mentioned as a group to be led out by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being led out with his fellow Gryffindors.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend who nudges him to get up from their seats.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the Head of Gryffindor House and leads her students out.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is the Head of Slytherin House and is seen wearing magnificent robes.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is the Head of Hufflepuff House and is described as looking clean.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: Madam Pince is a librarian who stands beside Filch in the Entrance Hall.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts and stands beside Madam Pince.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor House, as indicated by Professor McGonagall's instruction to follow the Heads of House out.
Professor McGonagall is the leader of Gryffindor House, as she leads her students out.
Professor Slughorn is the Head of Slytherin House.
Professor Sprout is the Head of Hufflepuff House.
